public static void RegisterRoutes ( RouteCollection routes )
{
routes.IgnoreRoute(""{resource}.axd/{*pathInfo}"");
routes.MapRoute(
""Default"", // Route name
""{controller}/{action}/{id}"", // URL with parameters
new
{
controller = ""Home"",
action = ""Index"",
id = UrlParameter.Optional
} // Parameter defaults
);
}
